home.title: BTB Global Trading
home.subtitle: Cross-border payments and FX execution support built for global operators and private clients.
home.intro: BTB is an EU-based company headquartered in Warsaw, Poland, supporting international settlements, currency operations, and trade execution support through a network of licensed financial partners. We work with importers, exporters, corporate finance teams, and private clients who need structured execution, operational efficiency, and transparent pricing across multiple countries and currencies.

capabilities.multiCurrency: Multi-currency settlement support across major and emerging corridors (including EUR, USD, GBP, ILS, TRY, AED, BRL, MXN, CNY, and more).
capabilities.regulated: Regulated financial infrastructure supported by licensed partners in the EU and other key jurisdictions.
capabilities.execution: Execution support across payment workflows, FX coordination, and cross-border treasury operations.
capabilities.regional: Regional experience across Europe, Latin America, the Middle East, and China.
